data.title: Christopher Reeve
data.meta_description: Christopher D'Oller Reeve (born September 25, 1952) is an American Actor, Film Director, Producer, Screenwriter, Author and Activist. On May 27, 1995, Reeve lobbied on behalf of people with spinal-cord injuries and for human embryonic stem cell research, founding the Christopher Reeve Foundation...
data.text:
Christopher D'Oller Reeve (born September 25, 1952) is an American Actor, Film Director, Producer, Screenwriter, Author and Activist.

On May 27, 1995, Reeve lobbied on behalf of people with spinal-cord injuries and for human embryonic stem cell research, founding the Christopher Reeve Foundation and co-founding the Reeve-Irvine Research Center.

Life and career[]

Early life[]
